mapper.select: SELECT su.id AS user_id, su.NAME AS user_name, su.account AS user_account, su.mobile AS user_mobile, sr.id AS role_id, sr.`name` AS role_name, sa.id AS area, sa.`name` AS area_name FROM sys_user su LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON su.id = sur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role sr ON sur.role_id = sr.id LEFT JOIN sys_user_area sua ON su.id = sua.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_area sa ON sua.area_id = sa.id WHERE su.del_flag = "0" AND sr.del_flag = "0" AND sa.del_flag = "0"
SELECT su.id,su.name from sys_user su LEFT JOIN sys_area sa on su.area_id = sa.id where sa.`name` = '局级'

SELECT su.id AS user_id, su.NAME AS user_name, su.account AS user_account, su.mobile AS user_mobile, sr.id AS role_id, sr.`name` AS role_name FROM sys_user su LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON su.id = sur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role sr ON sur.role_id = sr.id WHERE su.del_flag = "0" AND su.account = #{account}

SELECT su.id as user_id, su.`name` as user_name, sa.id as area_id, sa.NAME as area_name FROM sys_user su LEFT JOIN sys_user_area sua ON su.id = sua.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_area sa ON sua.area_id = sa.id WHERE su.id = #{user_id}

SELECT su.id AS user_id, su.NAME AS user_name, su.account AS user_account, su.mobile AS user_mobile, sr.id AS role_id, sr.`name` AS role_name FROM sys_user su LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON su.id = sur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role sr ON sur.role_id = sr.id LEFT JOIN sys_user_area sua on su.id = sua.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_area sa on sua.area_id = sa.id WHERE su.del_flag = "0" and sr.`name` = '审签初审人员' and sa.`name` = #{areaName}
